case_title: United States of America v. McMaster
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. McMaster

charges.charge_description: Produces/Traffics in Counterfeit Device in violation of Title 18, United States Code, Section 1029 (a) (2)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Keith G. McMaster (1) entered a plea of guilty to Count 1 of the indictment. The government and defendant waive the preparation of a pre-sentence report. Defendant sentenced to 3 years probation; $100.00 special assessment and restitution ordered in the sum of $26,102.16.
